chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini is having the following problem:
I placed an order with Chronopost delivery to get the phone quickly and I'm worried it hasn't been sent today.
I'm well aware that there's nothing fatal, but looking at the recent seller reviews (ecomobile) I think I have good reasons to worry. I need to leave on the 15th morning abroad and am therefore very upset if the phone is not delivered on time.
Thank you and good end of day.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

The customer's satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your message.

Please send the customer's package to this delivery address:
Nathan Haudot
14 Boulevard Victor Hugo
WH SERENA 14
92110 Clichy
France
07 82 53 09 58
nathan.haudot@outlook.fr

Regards,
Pélagie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing the customer's address, your assistance is greatly appreciated. The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number GH202923136JB. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202923136JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the collection point on 12th June. Kindly ask the customer to go pick up their parcel. And if the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
